meta.title: Our Sixth Anniversary
meta.subtitle: Six years, one heartbeat, endless gratitude.
meta.passcodeHint: Hint: the date that changed my life (MMDD)

storyCards.caption: When I first saw you this day, and suddenly life felt brighter.
storyCards.noteBody: When I first got your number, I did not know then how important that moment would become. All forward messages to each other had some hidden meaning behind them and I just knew I wanted one more conversation with you, and then one more after that.

storyCards.caption: Our endless rides in the town became a lifelong ride
storyCards.noteBody: Somewhere between small rides and meet ups here and there, I somehow knew this would become a lifelong ride of love and companionship.

storyCards.caption: We chose each other, not just once, but forever.
storyCards.noteBody: All we knew was we wanted to be with each other for a life time, that's it! We did not think much. But just that one belief was strong enough to overcome all hurdles. Even tough days felt lighter because we were a true team.

storyCards.caption: We made it!
storyCards.noteBody: Thank you for standing beside me through everything. Your calm, your kindness, and your courage have carried us through more than words can hold and allowed us to stay together forever.

storyCards.caption: Our Little World
storyCards.noteBody: We made our little world together bit by bit with tons of small moments, ups and downs, laughs and cries. You are still my safest and happiest place.

storyCards.caption: Today
storyCards.noteBody: After six years, a lot changed but my favorite part of every day is still you. Your smile, your hug, your voice, your presence, your love. Thank you for loving me in all my versions.

storyCards.caption: Thank you!
storyCards.noteBody: Thank you for celebrating my highs, holding me in my lows, and believing in me even when I doubted myself. Thank you for loving me in all my versions!

storyCards.caption: Chapter six is beautiful. Forever is waiting.
storyCards.noteBody: Happy anniversary, my love. If I had to choose again, in every lifetime, in every universe, I would still choose you.

quiz.question: Which moment made me realize you were 'the one'?
options: First time I saw you in annual function.
Our chat in the next annual function when you sent heart emoji for the first time.
Our small meetings and riding around on Activa.
quiz.revealNote: It was never one single moment, it was the way you loved in every moment.

quiz.question: What is my favorite thing about us?
options: We are always true to each other
How we do masti and fight
quiz.revealNote: No matter what we are friends first and that's the best thing about us.

quiz.question: What do I admire most about you?
quiz.revealNote: You are caring, pure hearted, kind and strong at the same time, and I fall for that every day. And your smile just melts me all the time!

quiz.question: What do I want more of with you?
quiz.revealNote: Adventures with you are fun, but even quiet time with you feel magical.

surprise.envelopeMessage:
Happy sixth anniversary, love! and well, actually happy 14th anniversary!

Just want to say I can't be grateful enough to the universe that it made you become a part of my life. I've told everything to you in the past that how lucky I am and all that, but today I want to just thank you!

Thank you for existing. Thank you for coming all the way across the world away from your family and staying with me. Thank you for always being there for me in all the ups and downs we've been through. Thank you for every smile, every hug, every hard conversation, every silly joke, and every quiet moment where your hand found mine. Thank you for caring for my family, becoming one, and putting up with them always. Thank you for learning cooking for us and  now being an amazing cook that you are that everyone loves. Thank you for always going above and beyond to take care of me, tolerating my weaknesses and forgetfulness some time, and thanks for being patient. 

Most importantly, thanks for the best gift one can ever get that you gave to me and our families, that is our cutie Aaru. Our time at hospital will always be memorable and those few days changed our life forever. Thank you for being a phenomenal mom, who is also very hot, and taking care of two kids now.

You have made my life softer, stronger, and far more beautiful than I ever imagined. I do not care much about the future as I know with you being my side, its going to be awesome. With you being my side we can overcome any hurdles, so don't worry much. 

I am proud of everything we have built and even more excited for everything still ahead of us.

No matter where life takes us, my favorite place will always be right beside you in your arms (or you in my arms).

Wish you a very happy 6th anniversary and more 100s to come.

I love you, endlessly. <3 <3
